English.Text:
Your navigators panic. Though the sails catch the breeze, the menfail to adjust out from under the falling wall. Blocks of ice the size of cows tumble onto the deck and explode to powder. A death and several injuries result. The rest are lucky that large waves from the icefall form a new avenue leading out to the open sea.

The crew enters King William Sound, a majestic carpet of water leading up to its seat, King William Island. Sensing something, Lady Faithful suddenly emerges from below deck, and voices the determined hopes of her heart...
